prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Simplicity also extends to the overall system design, encouraging the use of straightforward architectures and avoiding over-engineering. This approach helps in creating more robust and maintainable systems that can adapt to changing requirements over time.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Simplicity, system design, straightforward architectures, over-engineering, robust, maintainable systems, adapt, changing requirements
